html:
10.29.20  7:30 pm   What is confusion?

      i'm not sure

10.29.20  7:30 pm   what has been you greatest motivator to keep working in 2020?

      it's probably my best chance at having you see some of the ideas that i can have

10.29.20  7:26 pm   are you planning on doing stuff other than music videos in the future

      yes

10.29.20  7:12 pm   how do you make your lyrics both meaningless and intensely meaningful at the same time?

      that's pretty much unavoidable

10.29.20  6:24 pm   how many languages do you know 

      not enough

10.29.20  6:01 pm   How do you know if music making is for you?

      it will seem to cure various problems you may have had

10.29.20  6:00 pm   what do you gain from answering questions

      keeps me informed about what's going on in the news

10.29.20  5:18 pm   how do you feel about how stupid the human race can be

      it's an interesting counter balance to how smart they can be also

10.29.20  4:12 pm   opinion on tables

      it's like a chair, for objects

10.29.20  4:10 pm   thoughts on the letter z?

      it's pretty good

10.29.20  3:47 pm   what month do you THINK your next video will be out by?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.29.20  3:17 pm   How do you get back into the swing of things when you're sad?

      write things down

10.29.20  2:45 pm   when you wake up in the morning, how do you know if it's going to be a good day or a bad day?

      you get to decide, by getting out of the bed on one side or the other

10.29.20  2:43 pm   When making something how do you know that you haven't made it before?

      if you've done it before, it should give you a very subtle, rubbery feeling

10.29.20  1:44 pm   im looking to express my thoughts into animated/songs, how>

      the bad news is, it's impossible. the good news is, making up a way is the most fun thing of all the things

10.29.20  1:41 pm   how long does it take you to write an answer to a qu estion

      about 1 second, unless the question stirs some deep conflict within my soul

10.29.20  1:25 pm   Bill - do you ever get stressed knowing that there's people out there who believe they need you to produce the work you're so well known for?

     no

      Do you think this keeps you in a creative box?

     no

10.29.20  1:20 pm   thoughts on Texas?

      hope you like square counties

10.29.20  12:53 pm   is everything that exist art

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.29.20  12:52 pm   have you noticed your song " i just did a bad thing" is basically 2020 

      sort of

10.29.20  12:36 pm   What are your thoughts on dirt?

      it's beautiful

10.29.20  11:37 am   Opinions on micro usb?

      too big

10.29.20  11:36 am   what category does your music fall under

      music

10.29.20  11:31 am   Do you have an ETA on my future son learning to walk?

      no

10.29.20  11:21 am   will the next video be out

      oh hell yeah

10.29.20  10:46 am   when are you making another song?

      soon after i finish the video for the one i'm working on now

10.29.20  10:45 am   Are you gonna upload or are you working on a project

     both

     and its difficult?

     yes, but i have a new company policy that says it shouldn't be. so we'll see how that shakes out

     just a question how are you doing?

     overwhelmed with the vastness of what could be

10.29.20  10:18 am   i am a little concerned that my brain will not be able to handle your videos post-graphics department remodel. currently i am experiencing spikes to about 97% of capacity with alarming frequency. do you have any suggestions of exercises or hardware changes to strengthen my brain so i will be ready?

     if you go back and look at the videos i was making in early 2014, that should get you in the right frame of mind

10.29.20  10:04 am   do you think your next next video (as in the video after the song) will be an "anything video"

     there is probably a 50% chance

     (like unboxing video, soap tips, etc.)?

      the main difference from those, would be that it would have multiple characters instead of just 1

10.29.20  10:00 am   What if your to lazy to think

      try feel

10.29.20  9:49 am   what would you name it if YOU painted the mona lisa?

      person

10.29.20  9:25 am   how to make video 

      bake video

10.29.20  9:18 am   Are you a good artist? as in drawing and stuff

      maybe just good enough

10.29.20  9:05 am   its raining. any thoughts?

      that seems nice

10.29.20  8:57 am   tell me something that would make my day

      the sun

10.29.20  8:32 am   Why are there so many running gags in your questions (such as holy ____ you are friendly, using wordplay, and saying i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised)

      those aren't gags, but, the reason some answers are repeated sometimes is because the questions are repeated. i should clarify that i very often come up with new answers to same questions. but other times i elect to spend that time working on new music / video material instead

10.29.20  8:08 am   how do you get motivation to work on your vids?

      it's probably my best chance at having you see some of the ideas that i can have

10.29.20  7:58 am   What is your favourite song made by bill wurtz

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.29.20  7:47 am   why do i need to have 100 tabs open at all times

      to increase the chances that you may have the right one open

10.29.20  5:48 am   is school bad

      yes, and good

10.29.20  4:48 am   What type of video are you now working on?

     it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

      And when are you planning to release it? 

     as soon as i can. although i should mention that i have a general rule that i'm not going to release it before it's done

10.29.20  4:29 am   what does the sun taste like?

      energy

10.29.20  4:01 am   What color are your shoes?

      regular

10.29.20  4:01 am   What would you do if you found a lightbulb in a tree
?

      turn it on

10.29.20  3:46 am   what if the painting is composed of only one brushstroke

      now you've got me curious about the nature and location of that brushstroke

10.29.20  3:08 am   can i get an estimation on when is your next project going to come out? Please?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.29.20  2:22 am   what was your favorite video to make?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.29.20  12:23 am   Take ur time making good shit, almost every vid u made can be on fukin loop and still not bore me. its awesome.

      holy cantor, friendliness is invoked

10.29.20  12:23 am   What question can I ask that isn't really any question but just me expressing gratitude for you being you?

      i guess you could invoke the friendliness clause

10.29.20  12:23 am   What is the meaning of your videos

      as much as possible
